name: Elecoe's Abandon
modifiers: Throwing an Acid Flask consumes a Potion in order to throw an additional flask that deals (125 to 180)% more damageCan only trigger on direct throws and has no effect if you do not have a potion. Consuming a potion this way does not trigger the potion's health recovery, but does trigger other on potion use effects. The damage bonus is multiplicative with other modifiers.
+(1 to 2) to Level of Throwing Skills
(25% to 32%) Increased Area for Throwing Area Skills
lore: "I do not need to mend the wounds that a dead foe had not the chance to inflict" - Elecoe the Alchemist Thief
